title: Dating Roulette
description: Releasing July 9th Bexley Seven Dates.Seven chances to win my heart.It’s not hard – Don’t put ketchup on your eggs.Don’t wear tasseled loafers.For the love of all that’s Holy, don’t ogle the waitress.See? Simple…Yet no one can get it right.TristanDating Roulette.It’s Bexley’s game.Correction - it’s her life.A constant rotation of dates.You might get one; you might get seven. No one has ever gotten to eight. There’s only one rule – Don’t commit a dating sin. I’ve watched for years and bided my time. Now, it’s my turn to play.And I play to win.
author: D. Kelly
